item.title: Perpetrator in 1975 Iceland Bank Theft Comes Forward, 50 Years Later
item.description: Baskets of coins disappeared overnight from an Icelandic bank in 1975. Last month, someone finally owned up.

item.title: Trump Says He’s Going to Alaska to See What Putin ‘Has in Mind’
item.description: President Trump set a low bar for his summit with President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia, saying he was ready to walk away if no deal was forthcoming.

item.title: Philippines Condemns China After South China Sea Collision Captured on Video

item.title: As Heat Wave Hits Southern Europe, Wildfires Kill 2

item.title: Wildfires Rage in Spain as Temperatures Soar
